title: MBO Dom
content:
Market by Order (MBO) provides data on limit orders, specifically showing the order queue and the size of each limit order. You can see the number of orders (BID/ASK) and their sizes at each price level.

This data is only available for a Ritmic connection. The data from the Dxfeed connection is expected to be available in future versions of the indicator.
Aggregated quotes should be disabled.

The indicator is adaptive: when zoomed out, it displays a simple order book; when zoomed in on the price scale, more detailed information appears.

The queue is prioritized from right to left, meaning the orders closest to the price scale are first in line for execution.

The indicator displays a line of orders in the queue along with their sizes. To the right of the price level, you will see two additional values: total order volume and the total number of orders.

If you hover over the indicator values, they will be highlighted. Hold the Ctrl key to view detailed order information.

Price - Order price

Volume - Order volume

Time - Time the order was placed

Id - Order ID in the queue

Priority - Order's position in the queue

Indicator settings:

Colors

Bids

Color buy orders

Asks

Color sell orders

Text

Color text in the cells

MBO filters

Color filter

Highlight orders above the specified volume

Volume filter

Hide orders below the specified volume

Summary

Show volume

Show/hide the total order volume

Show orders count

Show/hide the total number of orders

Orders count filter

Highlight cells where the total number of orders exceeds the specified value

Volume filter

Highlight cells where the total order volume exceeds the specified value
